TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Tuo-ma-seLuo-puo-te’_Ma-e-sa’-se, title = Tuo-ma-seLuo-puo-te’_Ma-e-sa’-se, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tuo-ma-seLuo-puo-te’_Ma-e-sa’-se} }

S.FORM: = Tuo-ma-se.Luo-puo-te'. Ma-e-sa'-se托馬斯·羅伯特·馬爾薩斯 = nikaudip生平 pilecuhan ni Ma-e-sa'-se siidaay nu luma'an. ci ama nida ci Dan-ni-e u ce-sye-cia, pabaliway misulit ci Ta-wi. Siw-muo atu zan-ya-ke'. Lu-suo a cabay. iluma' tu ci Ma-e-sa'-se micudad, katukuh tu caypic walsip mihcaan maala tu nipicuda tu Cin-ciw tabakiay a cadudadan Yesu syeyun. yadah ku nananamen tu cudadan, sakay tida i nikasasetsetan, La-tin-wen atu Si-la-wen a cudadan makaala tu tu kawlah. u tada ni nanaman nida u suyei. . caypic siwcay mihcaan maala nida ku souse a hedekan tu cudadan, tawya nu tusaay a mihcaan mala Ye-su-hua cudadan nu yunse. caypic siwpic mihcaan pataydan ci nida i Sen-kun-hua a niyaduan mala buksi. malalid ni ama nida ci Wi-len.Ke-de-wen a sadadatengan , mikawaw misumad tu nu syakay a kawawan, ci Ma-e-sa-se tuyni a sasakamuen sapihantayay ku nida a kalaluman nu kawawan, mibelihay ci amaan nida, itini i caypic siwwal mihcaan caay pangangani nida ku sapatahekal tu cudadan, ngangan nu cudad han " sakay lalid nu sapisumad a tademawan tu nakamuan, misakamu tu ci Ke-de-wen a nakamuan. itida i caywal seplu mihcaan tayda midang i O-cuo tahekal aca ku " tademaw a cudadan". 1791 "人口論" ． i caywal sepsip mihcaan mikikun, tatulu ku wawa nida. caywal seplim mihcaan mala Ingkuo sayaway nu cence cinci sye a saydan, itida pasubana' i Dun-in-tu' kusi syeyun. mangaay ku micudaday nida miawaw ci nidaan u " tademaw" Ma-e-sa-se. . ci nida atu duma a cinci tase ci Li-cia-tu itini i syesu atu kunkun' cinci yadah ku sakacaay ka sasulul, nika u nuheni tatusa sakay cudadan sa caay kasasulul, sakay cudadan anikacaay ka sasululan nika u masasungaayay ku nuheni tatusa, nika caayan ka sasulul tu sakay In-kuo lalawpesan tu Ku-wu-fa, ci Ma-e-sa-se sakay liwmahan a musakamu " u lala' nipabeli nu paudipay" , nialaan tu talakaway nu damsuan a talakaway u nisuyan pakalawlaw tu silala'ay u siidaay sa, ci Li-cia-tu pakayda ci nida i Sing-sin cepencia atu mikuliay sakamusa " nisuyan a lala' u sakalihalay a satekesay, sisa caay pacumud tu namaka hekalay a tuudan misatadas tu lala' u sanai'ay kupucan sa. nu ayawan caywal lulu mihcaan, kaisa ci Ma-e-sa-se tu nikulitan a tademaw, mangucih ci nida. nina ngucih sizicuan kapah tu, u malakapahay a adihen nutaw. i labu nu kawilian nu laway idaw ku pela', utiih musakamu. hina adih kita tu lumaay nu heni. 1833年以前, . caywal lusiw mihcaan, masinzumiyu ci nida mapatay i kakadabuan nu luma nida, tademen i Ing-ke-lan a Pa-se-siw-taw-yen. 1834年, . Tincuciw天主教 tincuciw a sakaudip a syece kaisa tu lilun ni Ma-e-se, micili ci nidaan u sabaw pitu a secian Wi-ni-se caay kalecad nu la'cusay a nibelihan tu nutaw a cudadan. "tincuciw a cudad sulit sa, u sapaayaw tu tademawan a tinengan nai' ku'puc sa, misaahebal tu tademaw tada macunus a sakatalawan, u sakapahay a sapidem tu kawawan u sapikilimaw tu kapahay a saykay atu sapisakakawaw nu waywayan, sakapahay a sakay padekauwan, micudah tu sakay tademawan atu kiwkayan a nipikiwyikuan", sisa, tinsukiw mihantay miput tu sasalecuhan atu mikuwan tu tademaw, uyni atu Ma-e-se a nadatengan malecad. . masakaputay nu tademaw 人權組織 masakaputay nu mulecuhay a tademaw mihantay tu sihu tu nipikuwan tu mangalaya mulecuhay nu tataynaan, saan tada mikuwan tu tataynaan a sapilecuhan a kawawan. . lalid影響 itin i Tun-in-du' kuse syeyun, ci Ma-e-sa-se idaw ku nipatahekalan tu ka ngalayan tu sakacaay kalecad nu lilunan, tada yadah tu sa, mihantay tu sapabeli tu nu udip tu ngalay a Say-yi-tin-li. itawya u caay kaw masahicahicaay a li-lun, alaw u ta-siw-tiaw a masilacay tu sakaudip nu lilun a sayaway, misakasikaday ci nidaan, sakaudip a syeciw ci Ye-han. Mei-na-de. Kay-n-se patalabuen nida kuyni a nidatengan tu sasulitan. . yu mahida tada yadah tu ku nilecuhan mikapah tu sakaudip, a yadah ku mikuliay sa. sisa, ci Ma-e-sa-se sipakayda i baluhay nilecuhan, anu yadah ku nipilecuhan tu tademaw taneng micunus tu sakaudip sa, miwada' tu sakay tademawan tu sakasilaculan. nina nidatengan milalid tu sakaudip a tademaw ci Ta-wi. Li-cia-tu. . #%E7%94%9F%E5%B9%B3

= Too-ma-se.Loo-poo-te'. Ma-e-sa'-se托馬斯·羅伯特·馬爾薩斯 = nikaodip生平 pilecohan ni Ma-e-sa'-se siidaay no loma'an. ci ama nida ci Dan-ni-e o ce-sye-cia, pabaliway misolit ci Ta-wi. Siw-moo ato zan-ya-ke'. Lo-soo a cabay. iloma' to ci Ma-e-sa'-se micodad, katokoh to caypic walsip mihcaan maala to nipicoda to Cin-ciw tabakiay a cadodadan Yeso syeyon. yadah ko nananamen to codadan, sakay tida i nikasasetsetan, La-tin-wen ato Si-la-wen a codadan makaala to to kawlah. o tada ni nanaman nida o soyei. . caypic siwcay mihcaan maala nida ko soose a hedekan to codadan, tawya no tosaay a mihcaan mala Ye-so-hoa codadan no yonse. caypic siwpic mihcaan pataydan ci nida i Sen-kon-hoa a niyadoan mala boksi. malalid ni ama nida ci Wi-len.Ke-de-wen a sadadatengan , mikawaw misomad to no syakay a kawawan, ci Ma-e-sa-se toyni a sasakamoen sapihantayay ko nida a kalaloman no kawawan, mibelihay ci amaan nida, itini i caypic siwwal mihcaan caay pangangani nida ko sapatahekal to codadan, ngangan no codad han " sakay lalid no sapisomad a tademawan to nakamoan, misakamo to ci Ke-de-wen a nakamoan. itida i caywal seplo mihcaan tayda midang i O-coo tahekal aca ko " tademaw a codadan". 1791 "人口論" ． i caywal sepsip mihcaan mikikon, tatolo ko wawa nida. caywal seplim mihcaan mala Ingkoo sayaway no cence cinci sye a saydan, itida pasobana' i Don-in-to' kosi syeyon. mangaay ko micodaday nida miawaw ci nidaan o " tademaw" Ma-e-sa-se. . ci nida ato doma a cinci tase ci Li-cia-to itini i syeso ato konkon' cinci yadah ko sakacaay ka sasolol, nika o noheni tatosa sakay codadan sa caay kasasolol, sakay codadan anikacaay ka sasololan nika o masasongaayay ko noheni tatosa, nika caayan ka sasolol to sakay In-koo lalawpesan to Ko-wo-fa, ci Ma-e-sa-se sakay liwmahan a mosakamo " o lala' nipabeli no paodipay" , nialaan to talakaway no damsoan a talakaway o nisoyan pakalawlaw to silala'ay o siidaay sa, ci Li-cia-to pakayda ci nida i Sing-sin cepencia ato mikoliay sakamosa " nisoyan a lala' o sakalihalay a satekesay, sisa caay pacomod to namaka hekalay a toodan misatadas to lala' o sanai'ay kopocan sa. no ayawan caywal lolo mihcaan, kaisa ci Ma-e-sa-se to nikolitan a tademaw, mangocih ci nida. nina ngocih sizicoan kapah to, o malakapahay a adihen notaw. i labo no kawilian no laway idaw ko pela', otiih mosakamo. hina adih kita to lomaay no heni. 1833年以前, . caywal losiw mihcaan, masinzomiyo ci nida mapatay i kakadaboan no loma nida, tademen i Ing-ke-lan a Pa-se-siw-taw-yen. 1834年, . Tincociw天主教 tincociw a sakaodip a syece kaisa to lilon ni Ma-e-se, micili ci nidaan o sabaw pito a secian Wi-ni-se caay kalecad no la'cosay a nibelihan to notaw a codadan. "tincociw a codad solit sa, o sapaayaw to tademawan a tinengan nai' ko'poc sa, misaahebal to tademaw tada maconos a sakatalawan, o sakapahay a sapidem to kawawan o sapikilimaw to kapahay a saykay ato sapisakakawaw no waywayan, sakapahay a sakay padekaowan, micodah to sakay tademawan ato kiwkayan a nipikiwyikoan", sisa, tinsokiw mihantay mipot to sasalecohan ato mikowan to tademaw, oyni ato Ma-e-se a nadatengan malecad. . masakapotay no tademaw 人權組織 masakapotay no molecohay a tademaw mihantay to siho to nipikowan to mangalaya molecohay no tataynaan, saan tada mikowan to tataynaan a sapilecohan a kawawan. . lalid影響 itin i Ton-in-do' kose syeyon, ci Ma-e-sa-se idaw ko nipatahekalan to ka ngalayan to sakacaay kalecad no lilonan, tada yadah to sa, mihantay to sapabeli to no odip to ngalay a Say-yi-tin-li. itawya o caay kaw masahicahicaay a li-lon, alaw o ta-siw-tiaw a masilacay to sakaodip no lilon a sayaway, misakasikaday ci nidaan, sakaodip a syeciw ci Ye-han. Mei-na-de. Kay-n-se patalaboen nida koyni a nidatengan to sasolitan. . yo mahida tada yadah to ko nilecohan mikapah to sakaodip, a yadah ko mikoliay sa. sisa, ci Ma-e-sa-se sipakayda i balohay nilecohan, ano yadah ko nipilecohan to tademaw taneng miconos to sakaodip sa, miwada' to sakay tademawan to sakasilacolan. nina nidatengan milalid to sakaodip a tademaw ci Ta-wi. Li-cia-to. . #%E7%94%9F%E5%B9%B3
